name: Long

methods.name: format
methods.description: Returns the String format for this Long using the locale of the context user.

methods.name: intValue
methods.description: Returns the Integer value for this Long.

methods.name: valueOf
methods.description: Returns a Long that contains the value of the specified String. As in Java, the string is interpreted as representing a signed decimal Long.

description: Contains methods for the Long primitive data type.
